data.title: Punam Ohri-Vachaspati
data.text:

1. Eliason J, Acciai F, DeWeese R, Vega-López S, Ohri-Vachaspati P. Children’s consumption patterns and their parent’s perception of a healthy diet. Nutrients 2020, 12(8), 2322; https://doi.org/10.3390/nu12082322.
